topics.author: 4fe16df67f123b13e400003f

topics.body: yes
topics.author: 372056626361644cf4a70c00

topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5341dab76368721749000000#post_5341dab76368721749000000
Not all the time.  I'm mainly accident prone cause sometimes I think too heavily and forget to pay attention.

What happens when I run into things in a nutshell, "If violence really a necessity to human culture in that if you add up all the total damage in history caused by said violence if individuals didn't resort to violence the amount of money saved would be far greater than the amount for economic prosperity and that so forth it would be able to fix all the-"
*THUD!* (walks into tree)
"*OWW!*  As I was saying the cost effectiveness of war and so forth doesn't even co-"
*THUD!* (walks into door)
"*OWW!*  Not to mention the cost saving towards-"
*THUD!* (walks into chair)
"Okay, new plan; pay attention to where I'm walking"
